messages.title: It's a horse race
messages.content: More school places needed says Sal Brinton only Lib Dem can win Watford

messages.title: School places scandal
messages.content: Conservative County Council tell Local Newspaper 'no money to solve shortage of secondary places'

messages.title: Campaign success for pedestrian crossings
messages.content: Lib Dems celebrate major road safety boost after securing multiple new pedestrian crossings after years of local campaigns by Lib Dem Councillors.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Residents welcome Lib Dem plans to fight Labour's tax rises
Scandal reaches County Hall as Tory council says no money available for required expansions to solve school places shortage
Lib Dems fight for pedestrian crossings and celebrate road safety boosts, including new pedestrian crossings after years of local campaigns

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Lib Dem can win Watford
